# vfs_flags

**Function**

Retrieve mount flags.

## Declaration

```swift
uint64_t vfs_flags(mount_t mp);
```

## Parameters

- **mp**: Mount whose flags to grab.

## Return Value

Flags.

## Discussion

Results will be in the bitwise "OR" of MNT_VISFLAGMASK and MNT_CMDFLAGS.
